Text.Title: Instant Availability Check
Text.Description: Stop scheduling conflicts! See which rooms are free on an interactive map for your chosen time and date.

Text.Title: Effortless Room Requests
Text.Description: Create, track, and manage all your facility reservation requests through a simple, guided process.

Text.Title: Know before you go
Text.Description: Get room details: capacity, restrictions, and upcoming activities - just by clicking the marker on the map.

Text.Title: Instant conflict detection
Text.Description: Discover schedule conflicts before you set a reservation, and prevent a catastrophe brewing to happen.

Text.Title: Proactive resolution
Text.Description: Digi-Rooms doesn't just inform, it assists. With its intelligent recommendation engine, you don't have to waste brain power trying to figure out a better time and place for your reservation.

Text.Title: Print & Go Reports
Text.Description: Quickly generate printable documents like schedule timetables, room utilization reports, and detailed reservation slips.

Text.Title: Map Management at your fingertips
Text.Description: Administrators can easily upload floor plans and manage buildings, floors,and room markers with the Map Editor.

Text.Title: Streamlines approval process
Text.Description: Requests are seamlessly routed through Staff for initial approval and then to the Administrator for final confirmation.
